<@&496191261972234242> Type !join to sign up for expeditions, and if you need to cancel your sign up, just type !join again. 
Expeditions begin at 18:25, if you are late we will give your spot to someone from the wait list, and if you no-show/AFK you will receive a warning.
475791138771697664.disabledMsg: Expeditions are cancelled today for Christmas. Hope you are having a lovely holiday!
